entry.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: mlt131220/Astral3DEditor: 面相浏览器端免费开源的三维可视化编辑器，包含BIM轻量化，CAD解析预览等特色功能。 A free and open source 3D visualization editor for browsers, including BIM lightweight, CAD parsing preview and other features.

entry.title: l7aromeo/meocord: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.
entry.content: MeoCord Framework - lightweight and extensible framework designed for building Discord bots. With its modular architecture, support for TypeScript, and seamless integration with Discord.js, MeoCord simplifies bot development with a focus on flexibility, scalability, and modularity.

entry.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anygrid: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
entry.content: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
